name: A350_ti
title: AT2174 题解

name: CW666
title: 找规律赛高

name: Maysoul
title: 一道沉寂了两年的大水题

content:
题解区没有pascal大佬，于是蒟蒻本人只能发了题解

通过找规律，发现每12行会有循环

入门题实在~~简单~~,直接放代码
```
const f:array[1..11,1..5] of longint=((4,2,0,9,7),
                           (1,10,8,6,4),
                           (9,7,5,3,1),
                           (6,4,2,0,9),
                           (3,1,10,8,6),
                           (0,9,7,5,3),
                           (8,6,4,2,0),
                           (5,3,1,10,8),
                           (2,0,9,7,5),
                           (10,8,6,4,2),
                           (7,5,3,1,10));
var n,k,ans,p,i,j:longint;
begin
        readln(n,k);
        n:=n-2;
        p:=n mod 11;
        n:=n div 11;
        ans:=n*5;
        if n<=2 then
                for i:=1 to p do
                        for j:=1 to 5 do
                                if f[i,j]=k then inc(ans) else begin end
        else
        for i:=1 to p do
                for j:=1 to 5 do
                        if f[i,j]=k then inc(ans);
        writeln(ans);
end.
```
大佬路过，不喜勿喷
